channel.title: Anti xray changes
channel.description:
Lately we've been experiencing a number of glitches with the anti xray plugin. Containers will only appear if you place a block where they are supposed to be and then disappear once again when you walk an x amount of distance (is only fixed upon restart of the server and then it usually occurs again). Since all chests and furnaces are automatically locked with no restrictions, is there a need to have them included in the plugin? I'm not sure of the configuration of the plugin but is there a way to disclude them to prevent this bug?
Also on that subject, spawners are also incredibly glitchy when changing entities. The radius you are in doesn't effect its state until you update the block itself by punching it or placing another block on it. Yes we have to consider that this is a part of the game that xrayers like to target but considering mossy cobblestone remains when you are at a distance, changing the spawner to stone seems a little useless.

item.title: Anti xray changes
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

This is it now:

Integers:
  EngineMode: 2
  UpdateRadius: 2
  InitialRadius: 1
  ProcessingThreads: 3
  MaxLoadedCacheFiles: 256
  ProximityHiderDistance: 8
  ProximityHiderID: 1
  ProximityHiderEnd: 255
Booleans:
  UseProximityHider: true
  UseSpecialBlockForProximityHider: true
  UpdateOnBreak: true
  UpdateOnDamage: true
  UpdateOnPhysics: true
  UpdateOnPiston: true
  UpdateOnExplosion: true
  UpdateOnHoe: true
  UpdateThread: true
  DarknessHideBlocks: true
  VerboseMode: false
  NoObfuscationForOps: false
  NoObfuscationForPermission: false
  UseCache: true
  Enabled: true
Lists:
  ObfuscateBlocks:
  - 14 # Gold Ore
  - 15 # Iron Ore
  - 16 # Coal Ore
  - 21 # Lapis Lazuli Ore
  - 56 # Diamond Ore
  - 73 # Redstone Ore
  - 74 # Glowing Redstone Ore
  - 52 # Monster Spawner
  - 48 # Moss Stone
  DarknessObfuscateBlocks:
  - 14 # Gold Ore
  - 15 # Iron Ore
  - 16 # Coal Ore
  - 21 # Lapis Lazuli Ore
  - 56 # Diamond Ore
  - 73 # Redstone Ore
  - 74 # Glowing Redstone Ore
  - 52 # Monster Spawner
  - 48 # Moss Stone
  ProximityHiderBlocks:
  - 14 # Gold Ore
  - 15 # Iron Ore
  - 16 # Coal Ore
  - 21 # Lapis Lazuli Ore
  - 56 # Diamond Ore
  - 73 # Redstone Ore
  - 74 # Glowing Redstone Ore
  - 52 # Monster Spawner
  - 48 # Moss Stone
  RandomBlocks:
  - 4
  - 5
  - 14
  - 15
  - 16
  - 21
  - 46
  - 48
  - 49
  - 56
  - 73
  - 82
  DisabledWorlds: ['world_nether','world_the_end']
Strings:
  CacheLocation: orebfuscator_cache
ConfigVersion: 3

Read full topic

item.title: Anti xray changes
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

I can’t see any reason for people to xray in the nether, there is no ore in it and the only thing of value is glowstone/blaze spawners which are publicly displayed anyway

Read full topic

item.title: Anti xray changes
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I can disable certain blocks, I’ll disable chests and furnaces now, are crafting tables protected too?

edit:
Alright, this is the config I’m using now:

Integers:
  EngineMode: 2
  UpdateRadius: 2
  InitialRadius: 1
  ProcessingThreads: 3
  MaxLoadedCacheFiles: 256
  ProximityHiderDistance: 8
  ProximityHiderID: 1
  ProximityHiderEnd: 255
Booleans:
  UseProximityHider: false
  UseSpecialBlockForProximityHider: true
  UpdateOnBreak: true
  UpdateOnDamage: true
  UpdateOnPhysics: true
  UpdateOnPiston: true
  UpdateOnExplosion: true
  UpdateOnHoe: true
  UpdateThread: true
  DarknessHideBlocks: true
  VerboseMode: false
  NoObfuscationForOps: false
  NoObfuscationForPermission: false
  UseCache: true
  Enabled: true
Lists:
  ObfuscateBlocks:
  - 14 # Gold Ore
  - 15 # Iron Ore
  - 16 # Coal Ore
  - 21 # Lapis Lazuli Ore
  - 56 # Diamond Ore
  - 73 # Redstone Ore
  - 74 # Glowing Redstone Ore
  - 52 # Monster Spawner
  - 48 # Moss Stone
  DarknessObfuscateBlocks:
  - 52 # Monster Spawner
  - 48 # Moss Stone
  ProximityHiderBlocks:
  RandomBlocks:
  - 4
  - 5
  - 14
  - 15
  - 16
  - 21
  - 46
  - 48
  - 49
  - 56
  - 73
  - 82
  DisabledWorlds: []
Strings:
  CacheLocation: orebfuscator_cache
ConfigVersion: 3

Actually, now that I think about it, any reason why it shouldn’t be disabled in the nether?

Read full topic

item.title: Anti xray changes
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

I’ve already let mitb know that if the plugin lets him he can disable chest/crafting tables/furnaces from being hidden to improve performance.

Read full topic

item.title: Anti xray changes
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Sorry, I can’t really give a proper responce right now since I’m on my phone, but is that not how the plugin is supposed to work? I can agree it’s a little useless for chests and spawners now, but it seems to work a charm for the rare ores.

Read full topic
